alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cleveland, southeastern Grant, eastern Dallas, Jefferson and northwestern Lincoln Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fordyce to 7 miles west of Rison to near Kedron to near Nebo. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... Fordyce... Star City... Rison... White Hall... Altheimer... Humphrey... Grady... Kingsland... Whitefield... Hensley Island... Nebo... Feenyville... Lamont... Cottondale... Linwood... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Madding... Kedron... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
